creator: s.park@syntax-software.de
text:
The Project is developed on WinNt with IBMVisualAge3.5.3 and JDK1.2.2
If the Project runs on Tomcat,Tomcat-console shows the following error message,
Error :500   location:/FondsInfo/FondsInfoServlet
Interna Servlet error:
java.lang.NullpointerException
at java.lang.ClassLoader.resolveClass(Native Method)

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
There isn't enough information to attempt to diagnose this problem.  Marking
as "invalid".  Please supply a simple web application with instructions that
explain how to duplicate the problem so we can determine the cause.
